props.name: modelValue
props.description: The value of the textarea. In most cases you should use `v-model` instead of setting this prop directly.

props.name: id
props.description:
The ID for this textarea.

If you don't provide an ID, one will be generated automatically.

props.name: name
props.description: The name of the textarea, which is submitted with the form data.

props.name: rows
props.description: Number of textarea rows

props.name: describedBy
props.description:
One or more element IDs to add to the `aria-describedby` attribute, used to provide additional descriptive
	information for screenreader users.

props.name: autocomplete
spellcheck
props.description: Sets the `spellcheck` attribute on the textarea

props.name: disabled
props.description: If `true`, textarea will be disabled.

props.name: formGroupClass
props.description:
Classes to add to the form group. You can bind a string, an array or an object, as with normal
[Vue class bindings](https://vuejs.org/guide/essentials/class-and-style.html#binding-html-classes).

props.name: label
props.description: Text to use within the label. If content is provided in the default slot, this prop will be ignored.

props.name: labelIsPageHeading
props.description: Whether the label also acts as the heading for the page.

props.name: labelClass
props.description:
Classes to add to the label tag. You can bind a string, an array or an object, as with normal
[Vue class bindings](https://vuejs.org/guide/essentials/class-and-style.html#binding-html-classes).

props.name: hint
props.description: Text to use within the hint. If content is provided in the `hint` slot, this prop will be ignored.

props.name: hintClass
props.description:
Classes to add to the hint span tag. You can bind a string, an array or an object, as with normal
[Vue class bindings](https://vuejs.org/guide/essentials/class-and-style.html#binding-html-classes).

props.name: errorMessage
props.description: Text to use within the error message. If content is provided in the `error-message` slot, this prop will be ignored.

props.name: errorMessageClass
props.description:
Classes to add to the error message `

` tag. You can bind a string, an array or an object, as with normal [Vue class bindings](https://vuejs.org/guide/essentials/class-and-style.html#binding-html-classes).

props.name: errorMessageVisuallyHiddenText
props.description:
A visually hidden prefix used before the error message.

Defaults to `'Error'`.

props.name: maxChars
props.description: The maximum number of characters. If `maxWords` is provided, the `maxChars` option will be ignored.

props.name: maxWords
props.description: The maximum number of words. If `maxWords` is provided, the `maxChars` option will be ignored.

props.name: threshold
props.description:
The percentage value of the limit at which point the count message is displayed. If this prop is set, the count
message will be hidden by default.

props.name: messageClass
props.description:
Classes to add to the count message. You can bind a string, an array or an object, as with normal
[Vue class bindings](https://vuejs.org/guide/essentials/class-and-style.html#binding-html-classes).

props.name: textareaDescription
props.description:
Message made available to assistive technologies to describe that the component accepts only a limited amount of
content. The component will replace the `%{count}` placeholder with the value of the maxChars or maxWords param.

props.name: charactersUnderLimitText
props.description:
Message displayed when the number of characters is under the configured maximum, `maxChars`. This message is
displayed visually and through assistive technologies. The component will replace the `${count}` placeholder
with the number of remaining characters.

props.name: charactersUnderLimitTextOne
props.description: Message used instead of `charactersUnderLimitText` when there is only one character remaining.

props.name: charactersAtLimitText
props.description:
Message displayed when the number of characters reaches the configured maximum, `maxChars`. This message is
displayed visually and through assistive technologies.

props.name: charactersOverLimitText
props.description:
Message displayed when the number of characters is over the configured maximum, `maxChars`. This message is
displayed visually and through assistive technologies. The component will replace the `${count}`placeholder
with the number of remaining characters.

props.name: charactersOverLimitTextOne
props.description: Message used instead of`charactersOverLimitText`when the text is one character over.

props.name: wordsUnderLimitText
props.description:
Message displayed when the number of words is under the configured maximum,`maxWords`. This message is
displayed visually and through assistive technologies. The component will replace the `${count}` placeholder
with the number of remaining characters.

props.name: wordsUnderLimitTextOne
props.description: Message used instead of `wordsUnderLimitText` when there is only one word remaining.

props.name: wordsAtLimitText
props.description:
Message displayed when the number of words reaches the configured maximum, `maxWords`. This message is
displayed visually and through assistive technologies.

props.name: wordsOverLimitText
props.description:
Message displayed when the number of words is over the configured maximum, `maxWords`. This message is
displayed visually and through assistive technologies. The component will replace the `${count}`placeholder
with the number of remaining characters.

props.name: wordsOverLimitTextOne
props.description: Message used instead of`wordsOverLimitText`when the text is one word over.

props.name: beforeInput
props.description: Text to add before the textarea. If content is provided in the`before-input`slot, this prop will be ignored.

props.name: afterInput
props.description: Text to add after the textarea. If content is provided in the`after-input`slot, this prop will be ignored.

slots.name: label
slots.description: The content of the label. If content is provided in this slot, the`label`prop will be ignored.

slots.name: hint
slots.description: The content of the hint. If content is provided in this slot, the`hint`prop will be ignored.

slots.name: error-message
slots.description: The content of the error message. If content is provided in this slot, the`errorMessage`prop will be ignored.

slots.name: before-input
slots.description: Content to add before the textarea. If content is provided in this slot, the`beforeInput`prop will be ignored.

slots.name: after-input
slots.description: Content to add after the textarea. If content is provided in this slot, the`afterInput` prop will be ignored.
